anathema: Poison someone you didn’t intend to, harm a creature as punishment for a different creature’s crime, desecrate a corpse
edict: Avenge the wronged, protect the dead and the vulnerable, use poison and suffocation, heal others

<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Selket (Mistress of the Beautiful House)](/Deities.aspx?ID=640)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 6

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Avenge the wronged, protect the dead and the vulnerable, use poison and suffocation, heal others

**Anathema** Poison someone you didn’t intend to, harm a creature as punishment for a different creature’s crime, desecrate a corpse

**Area of Concern**
Embalming, healing, scorpions

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=42)

**Favored Weapon** [Whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=404)

**Domains** [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=78), [Magic](/Domains.aspx?ID=82), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=85), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=90)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=1678)

- **2nd**
[Vomit Swarm](/Spells.aspx?ID=2041)

- **3rd**
[Paralyze](/Spells.aspx?ID=1622)

</column>
name: Selket (Mistress of the Beautiful House)
